1.chat_cn: <outline color=blackwidth=2>OK，让我们来抽取一名球员。之后，每次常规赛比赛结束，都会赠送一次抽卡机会~</outline>
1.chat_en: <outline color=blackwidth=2>Ok, let's draw a player. You will also get a chance to draw after each regular match~</outline>

3.chat_cn: <outline color=blackwidth=2>来学习一下<color=#ffff00>球员阵容配置</c>吧。</outline>
3.chat_en: <outline color=blackwidth=2>Let's learn how to configure your <color=#ffff00>lineup</c>.</outline>

4.chat_cn: <outline color=blackwidth=2>好耶！前往常规赛试一下新阵容的威力吧！</outline>
4.chat_en: <outline color=blackwidth=2>Great! Now try your new lineup in regular matches!</outline>

5.chat_cn: <outline color=blackwidth=2>喔噢~球员可以通过养成，大幅提升实力，随我去看看吧！</outline>
5.chat_en: <outline color=blackwidth=2>Wow~ You can greatly improve the players' power by growing them. Come with me!</outline>

6.chat_cn: <outline color=blackwidth=2>通过指派<color=#ffff00>球员训练</c>，能够得到等级提升，大大增长各项属性能力哟~试一试吧~</outline>
6.chat_en: <outline color=blackwidth=2>You can level up the players and significantly increase their stats by assigning them to various trainings~ Try it~</outline>

7.chat_en: <outline color=blackwidth=2>Bingo~ <color=#ffff00>Team skill</c> is unlocked. Let's go~</outline>

8.chat_cn: <outline color=blackwidth=2>在这里呢，能够赋予球员炫酷的<color=#ffff00>球队技能</c>，搭配打造多样、个性化的组合阵容。</outline>
8.chat_en: <outline color=blackwidth=2>You can give cool <color=#ffff00>team skills</c> to the players and create customized lineups here.</outline>

9.chat_cn: <outline color=blackwidth=2>同时，球队技能还可以通过升级养成，提升效果哦。试试吧~</outline>
9.chat_en: <outline color=blackwidth=2>Team skills can also be upgraded, so they will have greater effects. Try it~</outline>

10.chat_cn: <outline color=blackwidth=2>球队绝佳的表现，致使整个联盟都在议论哟~足联<color=#ffff00>竞技场</c>已经向你发出了邀请函~</outline>
10.chat_en: <outline color=blackwidth=2>You have been performing really well recently, the whole league has been discussing about you~ The <color=#ffff00>competitive</c> union had sent you an invitation~</outline>

11.chat_cn: <outline color=blackwidth=2><color=#ffff00>竞技场</c>是真人实时匹配PVP竞技模式，通过与其他玩家角逐，能够赢得无上的荣誉，以及独一无二的竞技奖励哦。</outline>
11.chat_en: <outline color=blackwidth=2><color=#ffff00>Competitive matches</c> are real-time PVP matches with real players. By competing with other players, you will win great honor and unique competitive rewards.</outline>

12.chat_cn: <outline color=blackwidth=2><color=#ffff00>球队天赋</c>开放啦，所以，话不多说，跟好我~</outline>
12.chat_en: <outline color=blackwidth=2><color=#ffff00>Team talent</c> is unlocked. So, follow me~</outline>

13.chat_cn: <outline color=blackwidth=2><color=#ffff00>球队天赋</c>能够有效加强球队的实力。不同天赋，还可以配合球队与球员技能，打出多样化的组合与阵容。</outline>
13.chat_en: <outline color=blackwidth=2><color=#ffff00>Team talent</c> can improve your team effectively. With different talents, team and player skills, you can play multiple combination and lineups.</outline>
